name: Haunted Corny Maize
description:
Welcome to Bailey's Corn Maze! Where during this autumn season you can explore a fun little maze and maybe find a bit of romance along the way. Play as a young woman venturing into the maze all by herself, but with the chance of running into a few monstrous maids that are dealing with some issues ranging from mundane inconveniences to their own personality quirks getting in the way to being literally trapped in the maze until someone rescues them.

Features:

  • Multiple colorful and not heterosexual female characters to talk to!
  • Multiple endings (kind of)!
  • Get that corn maze experience without leaving your home!
  • Some kind of vague halloween aesthetic!
  • New game+ to save your progress with every new maze run!

Update:
1/28/18 - Uploaded a new mac build to fix a saving issue. 
5/19/18 - Mac and Windows builds are available in Chinese!
6/11/18 - Linux build now available!
